name: discue-io-api-docs
description: Documentation module of discue.io: A secure and reliable messaging and queueing service.

scripts.docs:serve: nodemon --ext md,vue,js,scss --ignore docs/.vuepress/.cache --ignore docs/.vuepress/.temp --watch docs/ --watch styles --exec npm run docs:dev
scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:styles && npx vuepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:styles && vuepress build docs
scripts.release-minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main

author: Stefan Pfaffel
